tips.hardwareWallets: Use hardware wallets for large amounts
tips.hardwareWalletsExpanded: Hardware wallets like Ledger or Trezor provide the highest security for storing significant amounts of cryptocurrency.
tips.verifyAddressesExpanded: Double-check contract addresses before interacting. One wrong character can lead to permanent loss of funds.
tips.keepAeForGas: Keep some AE for gas fees
tips.keepAeForGasExpanded: Always maintain a small balance of AE tokens to pay for transaction fees on the √¶ternity network.
tips.neverShareKeysExpanded: Your private keys are like the password to your bank account. Never share them with anyone, including support.
tips.enable2faExpanded: Use two-factor authentication on all cryptocurrency exchanges to add an extra layer of security.
tips.diversifyExpanded: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. Spread your investments across different tokens and projects.

hero.title: Your social, your wallet, your rules ‚Äî a decentralized network for everyone
hero.description: Sign in with your wallet and keep one portable identity across apps. Post on-chain when you want verifiable, timestamped ideas ‚Äî and tip creators instantly. It's simple, friendly, and powered by the √¶ternity blockchain.

privacy.title: Share your story ‚Äî
privacy.description: With wallet-based identity you decide what to share and what to keep. Your handle and reputation are portable across the √¶ternity ecosystem, and your posts can live on-chain when you want proof of authorship and permanence ‚Äî or off-chain when you prefer speed and lightness. You're in control either way.

decentralized.title: Fully decentralized
decentralized.description: Peer-to-peer by design. Nothing stands between you and the people you follow. Your identity and posts can be on-chain, so value flows directly to creators.

valueProposition.title: Wallet login makes your identity portable. On-chain posts are provable and remixable.

points.walletIdentity: Sign in with your wallet ‚Äî one identity across apps
points.socialGraph: Own your social graph and portable reputation

tipping.title: Sending crypto has never been easier
tipping.description1: Superhero's native wallet integrates seamlessly into your daily life and allows you to tip content and creators instantaneously ‚Äì at virtually no cost.
tipping.description2: Create invitation links, track your history, and more ‚Äì all in one place.

powerFeatures.title: Full of powerful features
powerFeatures.description: Tip what you value, meet with your community, vote on what matters, and embed tipping everywhere with the Superhero Button.

meet.title: Superhero Meet
meet.description: Spin up a conference room in seconds ‚Äì no account required ‚Äì and even live-stream to YouTube with real-time decentralized tipping.

voting.title: Superhero Voting
voting.description: Create polls, vote, delegate, and collect voting power from the community. Every vote counts.

button.title: Superhero Button
button.description: Add a simple, customizable tip button to your website or blog and let people reward your work.

openSource.title: Superhero
openSource.description: Dive under the hood, use the code, fork it, or run it locally. Join a global community pushing the ecosystem forward.

faq.heroTitle: Superhero ‚Äî the all‚Äëin‚Äëone social + crypto app
faq.heroDescription: Discover trends, mint community tokens, trade on bonding curves, chat in real‚Äëtime, and govern treasuries ‚Äî in partnership with Quali.chat.
faq.tip: Tip: Start with Getting Started, then explore Trendminer and DAO & Governance.
faq.gettingStartedIntro: New here? Here's the short version:
faq.gettingStartedLi1: Install Superhero Wallet and fund it with a little AE.
faq.gettingStartedLi2: Go to Trending and sort by Market Cap to explore tokens.
faq.gettingStartedLi3: Open a token, connect your wallet, and try a small Buy.
faq.gettingStartedLi4: Visit the DAO page to see treasury and proposals.
faq.featuresLi1: Trending lists with Market Cap default sorting
faq.featuresLi2: Token pages: chat, candlesticks, transactions, holders
faq.featuresLi3: Bonding curve trading (mint/burn) with DAO fee streaming
faq.featuresLi4: DAO pages: treasury, proposals, and voting
faq.featuresLi5: Governance: polls, delegations, and my account activity
faq.qWhatIsSuperheroAnswer: Superhero is a social + crypto app on the aeternity blockchain. You can discover content, create posts, tip, trade community tokens, and take part in on‚Äëchain governance ‚Äî all in one place.
faq.qChatPoweredByQualiAnswer: We partner with Quali.chat ‚Äî a quality chat app for crypto people. Expect realtime conversations, moderation tools, and crypto‚Äëfriendly UX. Each token has a public room; holders can coordinate faster.
faq.qWhatIsTrendingAnswer: Trendminer lets you tokenize trending ideas. Creators launch community tokens on a bonding curve. Price adjusts with buys and sells; no order books, just math. A small fee flows into a token treasury (DAO) to fund community initiatives.
faq.qQuickStartTitle: Quick start: how do I begin?
faq.qQuickStartLi1: Install Superhero Wallet and fund it with a little AE.
faq.qQuickStartLi2: Open Trending and sort by Market Cap to see established communities.
faq.qQuickStartLi3: Tap a token, connect wallet, and buy a small amount to try it.
faq.qQuickStartLi4: Join the token's DAO and vote on proposals when available.
faq.qBuySellTitle: How do I buy or sell a token?
faq.qBuySellAnswer: On a token page, use the trade card. Choose Buy or Sell, review the live quote, and confirm in your wallet. Tokens are minted/burned against AE along the bonding curve.
faq.qFeesAnswer: A portion of each trade funds the token's DAO treasury. Holders can propose and vote to allocate funds for growth, bounties, or community rewards.
faq.qHoldersVsTxTitle: What are Holders and Transactions tabs?
faq.qHoldersVsTxAnswer: Holders shows top addresses and balances for the token. Transactions lists recent buys/sells with timestamps and transaction hashes.
faq.qDaoAnswer: Every token has a treasury. Anyone can create proposals. Holders vote on‚Äëchain. If a proposal passes, the treasury can pay contributors or fund new ideas.
faq.qGovernanceAnswer: The Voting page provides a unified interface for browsing polls, voting, managing delegations, and viewing your on‚Äëchain governance activity. All governance functions are accessible through tabs within a single page.
faq.qSocialAnswer: Yes. You can browse posts, comment, and explore communities. Comments and token chats are powered by Quali.chat ‚Äî real‚Äëtime rooms built for crypto‚Äënative communities.
faq.qAccountsTitle: What can I see on Accounts pages?
faq.qAccountsAnswer: Account profiles show owned tokens, created tokens, and activity. Leaderboards highlight the most active creators and traders.
faq.qInvitesAnswer: Creators can run invite campaigns to grow communities. Invites may grant recognition or rewards depending on the token's rules.
faq.qAnalyticsTitle: How is Market Cap and pricing shown?
faq.qAnalyticsAnswer: We display price and market cap using AE as the unit. Trending defaults to Market Cap so larger communities surface first. Token pages include candlestick charts, recent transactions, and holders to help you read the market.
faq.qWalletAnswer: Use Superhero Wallet for aeternity. Install it, create or import your account, then connect on token pages to trade and participate.
faq.qRisksAnswer: Volatility and smart‚Äëcontract risk are real. Double‚Äëcheck addresses and amounts before signing. Never risk funds you cannot afford to lose.
faq.qHelpTitle: Where do I get help or report bugs?
faq.qHelpAnswer: Reach out via official channels listed in the app. Include the token name, your address, the tx hash, and what happened.
faq.qGlossaryTitle: Glossary: AE, sale address, DAO, tx hash
faq.qGlossaryLi1: AE: the native coin of the aeternity blockchain.
faq.qGlossaryLi2: Sale address: the contract that mints/burns tokens on the curve.
faq.qGlossaryLi3: DAO: on‚Äëchain treasury + governance for a token community.
faq.qGlossaryLi4: Tx hash: the transaction ID; view in explorers to verify.
